title: Let’s Connect!
text: Feel free to reach out for collaborations, work opportunities, or just to chat! I’d love to hear from you.

vn.title: Talk with JeeIn
vn.subtitle: Pick a choice and watch the reply change.
vn.prompt: Hi there. Choose what you need, and I will respond right away.

choices.project: I want to propose a project
choices.question: I have a technical question
choices.chat: I just want to say hi

responses.project: That sounds great. Thanks for the proposal. Please send it by email and I will reply quickly.
responses.question: Happy to help with technical questions. Ask me about stack, implementation details, or collaboration flow.
responses.chat: Love that :) You can always reach out just to chat. Feel free to message me anytime.

followUps.title: Want to go one step deeper?

choices.project_scope: I can share the project scope
choices.project_timeline: I want to discuss timeline first
choices.question_stack: What is your main tech stack?
choices.question_process: How do you collaborate and ship?
choices.chat_career: Tell me about your dev journey
choices.chat_random: I just want a casual chat

responses.project_scope: Perfect. If you send the main goals and key features in 3 to 5 lines, I can propose a clear direction quickly.
responses.project_timeline: Great starting point. Share your target date and checkpoints, and I can suggest a realistic delivery plan.
responses.question_stack: I mostly build with React and TypeScript, and connect backend/data layers when the project needs it.
responses.question_process: My flow is requirements alignment, small iterative delivery, and fast feedback loops with frequent status updates.
responses.chat_career: I started with small builds and now focus on shipping clean experiences with strong maintainability.
responses.chat_random: Absolutely :) A casual hello is always welcome. Feel free to message me in any tone.
